node.html: Ready for some fun mental challenges? Here's a beautiful memory game for adults and kids. Test your recall abilities and push them to their limits!

A beautiful landing page built for a Tech Company. The page if fully responsive for all screen sizes. All the images used for the project have been optimized for better performance. Specific favicons for android and apple devices have been added.
Are you ready to play Ping Pong? Here's a clean, colorful and easy to use score keeper for your next games. Have fun with it!
